data.eml:eml: Atlantic occurrence of the genus Bellottia (Teleostei, Bythitidae) with two new species from the Western North Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nielsen, Jørgen G., Ross, Steve W., Cohen, Daniel M. (2009): Atlantic occurrence of the genus Bellottia (Teleostei, Bythitidae) with two new species from the Western North Atlantic. Zootaxa 2018: 45-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186025
